name: Mandarin Oriental Kuala Lumpur
location: Kuala Lumpur City Centre, 50088 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description: Mandarin Oriental Kuala Lumpur is a luxury hotel located in the heart of Kuala Lumpur, adjacent to the Petronas Twin Towers. It offers spacious rooms and suites, a variety of dining options, a spa, and fitness center.

name: Traders Hotel Kuala Lumpur
location: Kuala Lumpur City Centre, 50088 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description: Traders Hotel Kuala Lumpur is a contemporary hotel located in the heart of Kuala Lumpur, directly opposite the Petronas Twin Towers. It offers modern rooms and suites, an infinity pool, a fitness center, and a rooftop bar.

name: Grand Hyatt Kuala Lumpur
location: 12, Jalan Pinang, Kuala Lumpur City Centre, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description: Grand Hyatt Kuala Lumpur is a luxury hotel located in the Kuala Lumpur City Centre, within walking distance of the Petronas Twin Towers. It offers spacious rooms and suites, a rooftop pool, a spa, and multiple dining options.

name: Shangri-La Hotel Kuala Lumpur
location: 11, Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur, 50250 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description: Shangri-La Hotel Kuala Lumpur is a luxury hotel located in the heart of Kuala Lumpur, within walking distance of the Petronas Twin Towers. It offers elegant rooms and suites, multiple dining options, a spa, and a fitness center.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Kuala Lumpur
location: 168, Jalan Imbi, Imbi, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description: The Ritz-Carlton Kuala Lumpur is a luxury hotel located in the heart of Kuala Lumpur, within a short drive of the Petronas Twin Towers. It offers luxurious rooms and suites, multiple dining options, a spa, and a fitness center.

name: Batu Caves Hotel
location: Jalan Batu Caves, 68100 Batu Caves, Selangor, Malaysia
description: Batu Caves Hotel is a budget hotel located just steps away from the Batu Caves temple complex. It offers clean and comfortable rooms, a restaurant, and free Wi-Fi.

name: My Home Hotel Prima Sri Gombak
location: 1, Jalan Prima SG 3/2, Taman Prima Sri Gombak, 68100 Batu Caves, Selangor, Malaysia
description: My Home Hotel Prima Sri Gombak is a budget hotel located within a short drive of the Batu Caves temple complex. It offers clean and comfortable rooms, free Wi-Fi, and a 24-hour front desk.

name: Sri Sutra Hotel
location: No. 12, Jalan SBC 6, Taman Sri Batu Caves, 68100 Batu Caves, Selangor, Malaysia
description: Sri Sutra Hotel is a budget hotel located within a short drive of the Batu Caves temple complex. It offers clean and comfortable rooms, a restaurant, and free Wi-Fi.

name: KIP Hotel
location: 2, Jalan Seri Utara 1, Sri Utara Off Jalan Ipoh, 68100 Batu Caves, Selangor, Malaysia
description: KIP Hotel is a mid-range hotel located within a short drive of the Batu Caves temple complex. It offers modern and comfortable rooms, a rooftop pool, a fitness center, and a restaurant.

name: Batcave Capsule Hotel
location: Blok F-2-3, Batu Caves Centrepoint, Jalan Batu Caves, 68100 Batu Caves, Selangor, Malaysia
description: Batcave Capsule Hotel is a unique budget hotel located just steps away from the Batu Caves temple complex. It offers capsule-style dormitory rooms, a communal lounge, and free Wi-Fi.

name: The Datai Langkawi
location: Jalan Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia
description: The Datai Langkawi is a luxury resort located on the northwestern tip of Langkawi Island. It offers luxurious villas and suites, a private beach, a rainforest spa, and multiple dining options.

name: The Andaman, a Luxury Collection Resort, Langkawi
location: Jalan Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia
description: The Andaman is a luxury beachfront resort located on the northwestern coast of Langkawi Island. It offers luxurious rooms and suites, a private beach, a spa, and multiple dining options.

name: The Danna Langkawi
location: Telaga Harbour Park, Pantai Kok, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia
description: The Danna Langkawi is a luxury resort located on the western coast of Langkawi Island. It offers luxurious rooms and suites, a private beach, a spa, and multiple dining options.

name: The St. Regis Langkawi
location: Jalan Pantai Beringin, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia
description: The St. Regis Langkawi is a luxury beachfront resort located on the southern tip of Langkawi Island. It offers luxurious rooms and suites, a private beach, a spa, and multiple dining options.

name: Four Seasons Resort Langkawi
location: Jalan Tanjung Rhu, Mukim Ayer Hangat, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia
description: Four Seasons Resort Langkawi is a luxury resort located on the northern coast of Langkawi Island. It offers luxurious villas and pavilions, a private beach, a spa, and multiple dining options.

name: The Edison Georgetown
location: 15 College St, Georgetown, Penang, Malaysia
description: The Edison Georgetown is a boutique hotel housed in a 1902 colonial mansion. The hotel features 35 guest rooms, each uniquely decorated with vintage and modern touches.

name: Muntri Grove Hotel
location: 127, Muntri St, Georgetown, Penang, Malaysia
description: Muntri Grove Hotel is a restored heritage mansion with 16 rooms and suites. The hotel features a courtyard garden, a rooftop terrace, and a swimming pool.

name: Campbell House
location: 106, Lebuh Campbell, Georgetown, Penang, Malaysia
description: Campbell House is a boutique hotel housed in a 1903 colonial mansion. The hotel features 11 rooms and suites, a courtyard garden, and a rooftop lounge with views of the city.

name: Seven Terraces
location: Stewart Ln, Georgetown, Penang, Malaysia
description: Seven Terraces is a boutique hotel housed in a row of 19th-century Anglo-Chinese terrace houses. The hotel features 18 suites, a Chinese-style courtyard, and a rooftop restaurant and bar.

name: Eastern & Oriental Hotel
location: 10, Lebuh Farquhar, Georgetown, Penang, Malaysia
description: Eastern & Oriental Hotel is a 5-star luxury hotel housed in a colonial-era building. The hotel features 232 rooms and suites, a seafront swimming pool, and multiple restaurants and bars.
